attributes.action:
That participation in all sex-separated sports be based on participants'
DNA
attributes.additional_details: The only way to fix this is the science, DNA does not lie. Don't let them steal the dreams of our girls, they deserve our protection, play fair!
attributes.background: Society is confused, distressed and enraged as fair sports becomes a victim of the woke Gender Wars, making the West look weak. In cycling, weightlifting and swimming we see absurd wrongs.

rejection.details:
Section 195 of the Equality Act 2010 already allows sports competition organisers to "exclude participation of a transsexual person as a competitor in a gender-affected activity if it is necessary to do so to secure in relation [...] fair competition, or the safety of competitors": https://www.legislation.gov.uk/ukpga/2010/15/section/195

Deciding who should be eligible to take part in individual sporting events are a matter for the organisers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
